examples.korean: His cartoons mercilessly lampooned the politicians of his time. 발음듣기 그의 만화는 그가 살던 시대의 정치가들을 가차없이 풍자했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His cartoons mercilessly lampooned the politicians of his time. 발음

examples.korean: The harsh light showed up the lines on her face. 발음듣기 가차 없는 불빛은 그녀 얼굴의 주름을 다 드러내 보여 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The harsh light showed up the lines on her face. 발음

examples.korean: His rivals knew that they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary. 발음듣기 그의 경쟁자들은 그처럼 가차 없는 적수에게서는 아무런 자비를 기대할 수 없다는 것을 알고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His rivals knew that they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary. 발음

examples.korean: The way she behaved towards him was utterly ruthless. 발음듣기 그에 대한 그녀의 행동 방식은 그야말로 가차 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The way she behaved towards him was utterly ruthless. 발음

examples.korean: ‘Oh, she’s just a kid,’ he said scathingly. 발음듣기 “아, 그녀는 어린애에 지나지 않아요.” 그가 가차 없이 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Oh, she’s just a kid,’ he said scathingly. 발음
